subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mo Williams made all seven of his 3-point attempts and LeBron James had 25 points and 12 assists as the Cavaliers rebounded from a loss in Charlotte by beating the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: Mo Williams made all seven of his 3-point attempts and LeBron James had 25 points and 12 assists as the Cavaliers rebounded from a loss in Charlotte by beating the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
